tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_productivity_data (
    productivity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    productivity_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_work_hours DECIMAL(6,2) NOT NULL,
    tasks_completed INT NOT NULL,
    team_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE collaboration_metrics (    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    metric_name TEXT,    metric_value FLOAT,    metric_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE team_members (    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    member_name TEXT,    member_role TEXT,    team_id INT );
CREATE TABLE team_performance (    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    team_id INT,    productivity_score FLOAT,    collaboration_rating FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE project_data (    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    project_name TEXT,    project_start_date DATE,    project_end_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE project (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);
